title: No private buses tomorrow: Gemunu
body_lines: The Lanka Private Bus Owners' Association (LPBOA) today decided to refrain from all bus services from tonight.
Addressing the media, LPBOA chairman, Gemunu Wijerathne, requested all bus owners to cancel all ticket bookings for tomorrow and to stop operating the services.
He said the decision was taken due to the current diesel shortage and in solidarity with the nationwide hartal tomorrow. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
